Name: Satan's Whiskers (Marcelled)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This riff on the Satan's Whiskers (in turn a Bronx variation) calls for it not to be 'curled' (as is the case when you use orange curaçao), but to be "marcelled", apparently a deep soft wave in one's hair (for those that still have some) created with curling tongs and popular in the 1920s and 1930s.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2011 by William "Chili Bill" Eichinger at Finnegan's Wake in San Francisco, USA, and courtesy of Gaz Regan's Ardent Spirits.
Nutrition: One serving of Satan's Whiskers (Marcelled) contains 167 calories
